H0.text: What section of a Qwerty keyboard can type most English words, left or right. Right

H1.text: What section of a Qwerty keyboard can type most English words, left or right. Middle

H2.text: What section of a Qwerty keyboard can type most English words, left or right. Top row

H3.text: What section of a Qwerty keyboard can type most English words, left or right. Left

A4.text: In the QWERTY layout many more words can be spelled using only the left hand than the right hand. Thousands of English words can be spelled using only the left hand, while only a couple of hundred words can be typed using only the right hand.

A5.text: In addition, more typing strokes are done with the left hand in the QWERTY layout.
